sect1.title: Tutorials
sect1.para: This section contains two tutorials demonstrating the use of JSure and SureLogic program annotations to assure the correct use of locks in two concurrent programs. The first tutorial uses a small closed-world example to demonstrate the complete assurance of a class and its usage, starting with no annotations at all. The second begins with a partially annotated program, and demonstrates more sophisticated concepts such as support for java.util.concurrent reader–writer locks.
